text: Mariyu nivu ekkadiki bayaluderina sare! Ni mukhanni (namaj lo) masjid al haram vaipunake trippuko. Mariyu mirekkadunna sare, mi mukhalanu dani vaipunake trippukondi. Dini valla miku vyatirekanga vadincataniki prajalaku avakasam dorukadu. Kani varilo durmargulaina varu (elanti paristhitulalonu urukoru). Andukani variki bhayapadakandi. Nake bhayapadandi! Mariyu i vidhanga nenu mipai na anugrahanni purti ceyataniki, mariyu bahusa, i vidhanganaina miru margadarsakatvam pondavaccu
